triples.name: Unmanned aerial vehicle
triples.relevance: The main subject of the comprehensive review, covering UAV classification, research trends, and applications.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: Key research area for advancing UAV autonomy and decision-making capabilities.

triples.name: Remote sensing
triples.relevance: Major application domain for UAVs in data acquisition and environmental monitoring.

triples.name: Swarm robotics
triples.relevance: Research area covering cooperative multi-UAV systems and swarming behavior.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Theoretical framework underlying cooperative control of multiple UAVs.

triples.name: Aircraft flight control system
triples.relevance: Core technology for UAV control and flight dynamics management.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: Mathematical foundation for designing UAV control algorithms and systems.

triples.name: Scopus
triples.relevance: Database used to quantify and analyze scientific documents in UAV research trends.

triples.name: Open-source software
triples.relevance: Software development approach for UAV platforms and research tools in the field.

triples.name: Miniaturization
triples.relevance: Key development area for creating smaller and more efficient UAVs for various applications.
